Key Match Events: Kawonga (31') scored the opening goal for Malawi
Saizi (83') scored the equalizing goal for Burundi
Nkhoma (75') scored the winning goal for Malawi
Pre-Game Insights: Malawi and Burundi are short of attacking firepower at their disposal
We are backing the home side to just about drag themselves over the line and claim a narrow win at the end of the 90 minutes
Malawi are keen to make a return to winning ways in front of their fans
Miscellaneous Highlights: Malawi secured a 2-3 win over Burundi
Burundi failed to win any of their opening four matches of 2024 before finally getting the better of Seychelles in their last involvement
Others: Patrick Mabedi's men finished third in Group D, five points shy of Guinea and a further five points adrift of group winners Egypt
Etienne Ndayiragije's men did come close to booking a place at the continental event in Ivory Coast, finishing just one point shy of Namibia in the race for the final spot in Group C
